Function: Open PDF file from disk - multiple tabs supported
Implementation Details: FileInput triggers openDocument() via useDocumentsStore - supports multiple documents in tabs
selectHandTool() sets activeTool='hand' in UIStore

Function: Activate select tool for text/object selection
Implementation Details: selectSelectTool() sets activeTool='select' in UIStore
Color picker popup with 8 colors - sets highlightColor and activeTool='highlight'

Function: Add text to PDF with font/color options
Implementation Details: handleAddText() activates addText mode - AddTextModal component handles styling

Function: Extract text from PDF using OCR
Implementation Details: useOcr hook uses Tesseract.js - renders page to canvas and extracts text to .txt file
openToOfficeModal() in UIStore - ToOfficeModal component handles format selection

Function: Convert PDF to Word via Python backend
Implementation Details: performConversion('word') calls /api/convert endpoint -> py_word_excel_html_ppt.py
handleEditText() sets activeTool='editText' - TextEditorPanel handles editing
handleEditImage() sets activeTool='editImage' - enables image selection box

Function: Add text that persists in saved PDF
Implementation Details: addText mode + applyAllModificationsToPdf() embeds text on save via pdf-lib

Function: Embed image into current PDF page
Implementation Details: handleAddImage() opens file picker - embeds PNG/JPG via pdf-lib embedPng/embedJpg

Status: handleRotate() with 3 options: 90° CW/CCW/180° - uses page.setRotation() via pdf-lib
Implementation Details: No

Status: handleResize() activates editImage mode - drag corners to resize
Implementation Details: No
No

Button/Sub-Button: Crop PDF page with margin input
Status: handleCropPage() prompts left/bottom/right/top - uses page.setCropBox() via pdf-lib
Implementation Details: No

Function: Insert blank page (A4/Letter) or from PDF
Implementation Details: handleInsertPage() with 3 options - uses insertPage() and copyPages() via pdf-lib
handleDeletePage() with confirm() - uses removePage() via pdf-lib

Function: Export current page as separate PDF
Implementation Details: handleExtractPage() creates new PDFDocument and triggers download
handleRotatePage() with page.setRotation() via pdf-lib mutateActivePdf helper
handleReverseRotate() subtracts 90° from current rotation
handleReorderPages() validates order - creates new doc with copyPages()
handleDuplicatePage() copies from immutable source to prevent corruption
handleEncrypt() shows alert only - backend /api/encrypt-pdf exists but frontend not connected
handlePermissions() shows alert only - backend set_permissions.py exists but not connected
handleDigitalSignature() shows alert only - no actual signature implementation
handleRedaction() shows instructions only - no redaction tool or backend
handleRemoveMetadata() shows alert only - could use pdf-lib setTitle/setAuthor to clear
performConversion('word') in ConvertTab calls /api/convert -> py_word_excel_html_ppt.py
performConversion('excel') in ConvertTab calls /api/convert -> py_word_excel_html_ppt.py
performConversion('ppt') in ConvertTab calls /api/convert -> py_word_excel_html_ppt.py
exportImage() captures canvas - offers PNG/JPG/WebP format choice
exportPDFa() sets metadata (title/author) and exports via pdf-lib
exportToText() calls /api/convert with format='text' -> pdf_to_text.py
handleMergeNow() combines all open documents using copyPages() via pdf-lib
handleToolsSplit() prompts for pages but only shows alert - no actual split
handleCompress() shows alert only - backend compress_pdf.py exists but not connected
handleInspectPDF() displays numPages/name/size from activeDocument
handleOCRAdvanced() shows dialog only - basic OCR works via Tesseract.js
handleFlatten() shows alert only - annotations stored separately not flattened
setHighlight() via useCommentTools - toggles activeTool='highlight'
setUnderline() via useCommentTools - toggles activeTool='underline'
setStrikeout() via useCommentTools - toggles activeTool='strikeout'
setStickyNote() via useCommentTools - toggles activeTool='sticky-note'
setPen() via useCommentTools - toggles activeTool='pen'
toggleCommentsPanel() in UIStore - CommentsPanel component shows all annotations
handleAddPDFs() opens file picker - opens each PDF in new tab
handleMergeNow() iterates all documents - creates merged PDF via copyPages()

Function: Open merged PDF in new tab
Implementation Details: handleOpenMerged() calls openDocument(mergedFile)
handleOpen() triggers fileInputRef.click() - openDocument() loads PDF
handleSave() applies highlights/text/image edits via applyAllModificationsToPdf()
handleSaveAs() prompts for name - applies modifications and downloads
handlePrint() creates hidden iframe and calls print() - fallback opens new tab
handleExportWord() calls performExport('word') -> /api/convert
handleExportExcel() calls performExport('excel') -> /api/convert
handleExportPPT() calls performExport('ppt') -> /api/convert
handleExportImage() opens image export modal
handleExportText() calls performTextExport() -> /api/convert format=text
handleExportHTML() calls performExport('html') -> /api/convert
handleCloseDoc() calls closeDocument(activeDocId)
handleDownloadLog() calls logger.download() - exports as .txt
handleProperties() calls openPropertiesModal() in UIStore
Same as handleInsertPage - accessible from icon bar
Same as handleDuplicatePage - accessible from icon bar
Same as handleDeletePage - accessible from icon bar
handleRefreshButton() calls location.reload()
handleExportButton() opens ToOfficeModal
Same as handlePrint() - opens print dialog
handleZoomIn() increases zoom by 0.25 (max 3.0)
handleZoomOut() decreases zoom by 0.25 (min 0.5)
zoom state shown as percentage (e.g. 100%) in UI
